name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mobile Design for Social Network Sites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify mobile version of facebook design while using it on your desktop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use this?
Just install the extension and done! 

Note: This extension isn't associated with Meta nor Facebook.

-Some perks using this mobile version.

1. Facebook Messenger message status
By turning off your active status in facebook + using m.facebook.com. Senders will not be informed that their messages are already *delivered* to you. So that they will think that you're offline üôÇ.

2. Save data
By minimal image and less functionality, you can save up data or even browse faster if your internet is like a üêå

3. Layout revamped
Since the m.facebook.com is for mobile and you/we are using desktop, the layout will be huge to the point that fill your screen and be annoying, and that's one of the reason why this extension exist, to fix it.
